hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EWIR.EWIR_ID, EWIR.EWIR_WORK_ORDER_NO, EWIR.EWIR_LINE_NO, EWIR.EWIR_EOOU_CODE, EWIR.ORG_ID, EWIR.REC_VER, EWIR.MODIFY_TIME , EWIR.MODIFIER, EWIR.CREATE_TIME , EWIR.CREATOR , EWIR.REC_STATUS , EWIR.EWIR_EOKC_CODE , EWIR.EWIR_EOKC_NAME , EWIR.EWIR_REMARK_TYPE , EWIR.EWIR_KEY, EWIR.EWIR_IS_MUST_ENTER , EWIR.EWIR_CONTROL , EWIR.EWIR_REMARK_VALUE_CODE , EWIR.EWIR_REMARK_VALUE_NAME , EWIR.EWIR_ORDER_NO FROM EO_WORK_ITEM_REMARK EWIR WHERE 1=1 <<AND EWIR.ORG_ID=:orgId>> <<AND EWIR.EWIR_LINE_NO IN (:ewirLineNo)>> <<AND EWIR.EWIR_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE :ewirWorkOrderNo>>
